copy.head: #API Christmas
p: Itâ€™s that festive time of year again, and HarrimanSteel & Suburb have joined forces to bring you a modern Christmas experience. The Nativity Story, remixed through digital media.
Pulling together APIs from the all expansive corners of the internet, we have created a bespoke storytelling experience that will be different every time you interact with it.
This is the digital nativity remix from Instagram that we have blended and stitched together in real-time, to bring you the most up-to-date global response to the story unfolding before your eyes.
Follow the link for your undiluted, one-of-a-kind, storytelling experience, and have a very #API CHRISTMAS.
